commodities.event
Interface PriceListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
ContractPanel.ContractTableModel, PricePanel.PriceTableModel, TestManager
public interface PriceListener
extends EventListener

The PriceListener is an EventListener that listens for the individual price information to change.

Version:
1.0
Author:
J.R. Titko
Updated:
2004.11.11
